attributes.action: condemn and combat the exposure of children to pornography and indecent culture
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: through music videos, television, magazines, computer websites and games, on the grounds that young minds are vulnerable and should not be corrupted for commercial gain

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
